author: Taylor Lyles
title: OpenTable will allow people to reserve shopping times at supermarkets
description: OpenTable wants to let you reserve shopping times at supermarkets, so we can help decrease the spread of the novel coronavirus and alleviate long lines at essential businesses.
content:
The feature would work much like restaurant reservations 
Image: OpenTable
OpenTable wants to let you reserve shopping times at supermarkets to help decrease overcrowding and make stores safer for shoppers.
